synopsis: Ryousuke is a well-known pervert around school, but when an attractive female is waiting for him outside his house in the rain, the setup is almost to perfect.
Lisara is not only living with Ryousuke but has also transferred into his class.  Her search for a powerful contractor continues at school.
There are 8 special individuals at the school with unique skills.  Lisara needs to test their powers, but the 1st one proves to be a big challenge.
Fukumune Iria is back and she has joined Ryousuke and Lisara's class.  She wants to find that special person before Lisara does and will do anything.
Mina and Quele follow Ryousuke around as he expands his dictionary. Mina's admiration for Ryou is starting to become infectious.
The truth behind Ryousuke having the sword is revealed and it takes a Mother to do it.
Ryousuke rush to rescue Mina has put everyone in danger. The reality of the situation is setting in and while physically ok, he is mentally unable to raise his perv power.
A war breaks out in the Grimworld to retake the tower from Galdarblog. Lisara and Iria attempt to rescue Mina while Ryosuke recovers.
Ryosuke and Galdarblog have a duel in which results in the wall between both worlds being broken and Ryosuke victor.

Aftershocks of the battle have created chaos, but the girls struggle to stall Ryosuke from finding out until things settle down. But a new Grim Reaper appears, and her appearance is not with good tidings
With the identity of the school's special person found, all that's left is to have that person burst out with enough energy to save Ryosuke. But there's an obstacle to overcome first.

title.jp: Dakara H ga Dou Toka Iu na

synopsis: Ryousuke picked death, but the ladies that love him refuse to let him go. The group gets one final chance to save him thanks to an e-mail.
